property.name: opentsdb.opentsdb_version
property.description: Version of OpenTSDB to install. This value MUST correspond to a *release* version on OpenTSDB's Github site (https://github.com/OpenTSDB/opentsdb/releases)

property.name: opentsdb.create_schema
property.description: Whether OpenTSDB schema should be created. Hbase must be started if this is selected
